name: Winona Hurst WALDON and Walter Waldon v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY and First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain. Petition of First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain
name_abbreviation: Waldon v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

parties: Winona Hurst WALDON and Walter Waldon v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY and First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain. Petition of First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of June 2011, the Application for King’s Bench and Extraordinary Relief is DENIED. The Application for Emergency Stay of Proceedings is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
22 A.3d 210
Winona Hurst WALDON and Walter Waldon v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY and First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain. Petition of First Transit, Inc. and Troy Chamberlain.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 10, 2011.
